name: 触尾少女
description:
Game Description


Huntress Yuki and her brother Yuu depend on each other, living in a remote village.
With her vigorous skill, she can support herself and her brother by hunting.
One day, Yuki encountered an unexpected event while hunting. Yuki's life turned upside down since then.

Game Elements


Turn-based RPG elements
Accumulate EXP to level up your character
Mouse exclusive features
Easy and engaging plot
A beautiful world map
